businesses.description: · Hydraulic component rebuilds</br>· Repairing and distributing a wide variety of pumps and valve parts</br>· Recharging and repairing accumulators</br>· Repairing hydrostatic transmissions</br>· Honing (up to 36”dia. X 21’ lg.)</br>· Lathe Work</br>· Lapping</br>· Boring Mill</br>· Surface grinding and blanchard grinding (up to 42”)</br>· Certified welding (steel and aluminum)</br>· Fabrication</br>· Hard surfacing</br>· General machine shop</br>· Repairing flywheels</br>· Sandblasting</br>· Precision balancing</br>· Supplying hydraulic hoses and fittings

Swanson Industries is a worldwide supplier of hydraulic, machining and plating services with expertise in designing and manufacturing new products; remanufacturing and repairing components; engineering; and distribution of certified products.
